attributes.name: state
attributes.description: Sets the visual state of the checkbox.

attributes.name: checked
attributes.description: Instructs the checkbox to display it's 'checked' state. Adds the expected 'checked' attribute, like a native <input type='checkbox'>.

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Sets the visual and interaction state to be disabled.

attributes.name: icon
attributes.description: If set, transforms the checkbox graphic into an icon (for icon options see: strand-icon).

detail.name: state
detail.description: The current state of the checkbox. Will report 'unchecked', 'checked', or 'partial' state.
